charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1101_010:
While walking around, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
overheard an argument between one person and
another, much louder one.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1101_020: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to take a closer look.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_030:
Aw, come on! And I thought we’d found a rare
Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_040:
We don’t stand a chance against that punk!
Let’s get outta here!
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_050:
All bark, no bite. Seems they’ve still got a ways
to go... Hm?
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_060:
Oh. It’s just you... Did you see some weirdos
come through here?
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0401_080:
I see. I guess there’s no reason to keep chasing
after them.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0402_100:
I see. Those Trainers were weak, but perhaps
their real strength is in running away.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_110:
Those fools ambushed me while I was walking
and demanded that I hand over my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_120:
And if that weren’t bad enough, they thought
they’d sell it for a high price because it’s rare.
Just what do they think Pokémon are?!
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_130:
Though...I may not have been so different once.
But that was a long time ago.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_140: I used to run with a group just like those guys.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_150:
Hmph. I know what’s important, though. No use
looking back on what can’t be changed. I need to
look ahead to the future I can still shape.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0401_180:
Hmph... I guess that’s one way of putting it.
But it’s more personal to me than that.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0402_200:
I’m not what you’d call a great guy or anything.
My reasons are actually pretty selfish.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_210:
When you get right down to it, I just really hate
people who exploit others to benefit themselves.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_220:
My Pokémon, Type: Null, was created by people
who wanted to use it for their own ends.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_230:
And as long as they got what they wanted, they
didn’t care about any of the terrible things that
Type: Null had to endure.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_240: They didn’t care at all about how Type: Null felt!
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_250:
People change when they’re chasing a goal.
Some people change for the better, and some
just end up turning bad...
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0401_270:
I suppose it’s normal to feel that way. But those
people were too far gone to feel the same.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0402_290: Nothing you need to worry about.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_300:
I just couldn’t sit by and watch Type: Null be so
unhappy anymore, so I took it with me.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_310: And I decided I’d get stronger to protect it.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_320:
But...after my battles with a certain Trainer,
I realized I was just making excuses to bury
my loneliness.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_330:
Silvally and I, we take care of each other.
It’s a mutual arrangement, not one-sided at all.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_340:
We’re equal partners. That’s what it means to be
a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0301_360: You must really care about Silvally.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0302_380: You two make for a unique sync pair!
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_0402_390: Hmph... If you say so. That suits me just fine.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_400:
We’ve stood here talking long enough.
Let’s get going, Nu—
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_410: Hmph. Sorry. Old habits are tough to break.
charaepi_ch0119_00_gladion/2301_1201_420:
You’re not Type: Null anymore. You’re...no, we’re
different from the way we used to be.
